title: "ABB recycling program refurbishes aging robots"
excerpt: "Under the terms of its buy-back service, Zurich, Switzerland-based ABB will recycle or remanufacture the old bots, ensuring that they avoid being scrapped when their lifetimes could be extended, the company said."
